title: Boy Tries To Win Over Girl With A Foul Ball
teaser: During a Blue Jays/Rangers game, a boy catches a foul ball. He gives it to an older girl, who flashes a big smile. Video shows he gave her a ball he already had in his hand â€” he kept the foul ball.
